com.karusmc.commons.commands

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.command.Command
      • com.karusmc.commons.commands.Command
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PluginCommand

    public abstract class Command
extends org.bukkit.command.Command
    Represents a Command, which executes various tasks upon user input.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public boolean execute(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                       String label,
                       String[] args)
        Wrapper method that delegates execution to execute(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender, java.lang.String[])
        Specified by:
        execute in class org.bukkit.command.Command
        Parameters:
        sender - Source object which is executing this command
        label - The alias of the command used
        args - All arguments passed to the command, split via ' '
        Returns:
        always returns true
